Description: Worn textile fragment; undyed linen cloth of medium-coarse quality; no original edges. The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.19 ends per 10mm and weft c.9-10 picks per 10mm.
Curator's comments: The separateness of the threads and frequency of splicing gives this an early feel. Information from Hero Granger-Taylor [1992]
